info.title: Boot it!
info.author: Nuvalo
info.details:
Boot it!: General wiilinux filesystem loader

	Boot it! is a wii-linux kernel with a small ramdisk that will let you boot any filesystem prepared to run on wii, installed on any device. This means that you can boot a filesystem installed on a usb device, on a SD-Card, or a filesystem image in a SD-Card or USB device. Right now has some limitations, read the "README" file that comes with it.
  
  Thanks to all the wii-linux developpers:
- The gc-linux team and Isobel, who did this possible
- All the #wii-linux contributors: Muzer, Bertjan, T7g... the list is very long
- Special thanks to t7g and berjan for "bliight" and "xwhiite"
- Of course, thanks to the Team Twiizers, for their Homebrew channel and Twilight hack

Any problems, ask them on #wii-linux at efnet.
